com.aspose.html.android.api

Interface DocumentApi


  • public interface DocumentApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String storage, java.lang.String folder)
      Return the HTML document by the name from default or specified storage.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentByXPath(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String outFormat, java.lang.String xPath, java.lang.String storage, java.lang.String folder)
      Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified XPath query.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentByXPathByUrl(java.lang.String outFormat, java.lang.String sourceUrl, java.lang.String xPath)
      Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified XPath query by the source page URL.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentImages(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String folder, java.lang.String storage)
      Return all HTML document images packaged as a ZIP archive.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentImagesByUrl(java.lang.String sourceUrl)
      Return all HTML page images packaged as a ZIP archive by the source page URL.

      • GetDocument

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @GET(value="html/{name}")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocument(@Path(value="name")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                              @Query(value="storage")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String storage,
                                                                                                                              @Query(value="folder")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String folder)
        Return the HTML document by the name from default or specified storage.
        Parameters:
        name - The document name. (required)
        storage - The document folder (optional)
        folder - The document folder. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<ResponseBody>

 @GET(value="html/{name}/fragments/{outFormat}")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentByXPath(@Path(value="name")

        Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified XPath query.
